attributes.action: Teachers and all school staff must wear face coverings in schools unless exempt.
attributes.additional_details: In order to reduce the transmission of the coronavirus in education settings. Schools, Nurseries, Universities etc, all people unless exempt due to age and or ability should be instructed to wear face coverings. This should include transport workers/agency staff/crossing wardens etc aswell.
attributes.background: Parliament must extend the necessity to wear face coverings from public transport and shops to all education settings aswell for the safety of staff and students.
